summary: The module supplies utilities for integrating VizTracer tracing with child processes. It defines a class that builds and runs an external command in a separate process while preserving tracing settings, and provides helper functions to patch multiprocessing and subprocess mechanisms so that forked or spawned processes inherit the tracing configuration.
business_intent: Allow applications using VizTracer to automatically trace code executed in subprocesses or multiprocessing workers, ensuring comprehensive performance and execution profiling across process boundaries.
